moduleMeta.name: soilParameters
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: reading soil parameters including saturated soil moisture, residual soil moisture, the van Genuchten model parameters and saturated hydraulic conductivity, etc.

var.name: alphaFile
var.description: van Genuchten model's alpha file path

var.name: waternFile
var.description: van Genuchten model's n file path

var.name: elev2D
var.description: elevation at each grid of the study area

var.name: soilDepth2D
var.description: soil depth at each grid of the study area

var.name: acquiferDepth2D
var.description: average depth of the unconfined acquifer at each grid of the study area

var.name: layerDepth3D
var.description: soil depth of each layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: wsat3D
var.description: saturated soil moisture of each layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: wfld3D
var.description: soil moisture at field capacity of each layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: wrsd3D
var.description: residual soil moisture of each layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: alpha3D
var.description: van Genuchten model's alpha of each layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: watern3D
var.description: van Genuchten model's n of each layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: ksat3D
var.description: saturated hydraulic conductivity of each layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: kg2D
var.description: hydraulic conductivity of groundwater at each grid of the study area

var.name: GWcs2D
var.description: groundwater storage coefficient at each grid of the study area
